column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I guess my food snobbery finally caught up to me
column2: because I was expecting the upsell about how it's made from some local grain miller with whole wheat
column3: and the pecans are locally sourced from a farm in the Hill Country
column4: and the pears are grown by some guy in Pearland that's been farming for 150 years or some garbage like that.
